text: Out of the Silent Planet is a book by C. S. Lewis. In it Dr. Elwin Ransom is kidnapped and brought to Mars by Professor Weston and Dr. Richard Devine. Dr. Ransom escapes and finds out that Mars is ruled by an alien space Angel called an Oyarsa who was sent there by Maleldil. It was first published in 1938. Category:1938 books Category:Books by C. S. Lewis
title: Out of the Silent Planet
